instanceVariables.name: TextToPrint
instanceVariables.desc: ; separated list of dialogue to show when the player is close

instanceVariables.name: SpeechBubbleAtLeft
instanceVariables.desc: True if the speech bubble needs to be on the left-side, false if it needs to be on the right

instanceVariables.name: currentDialogueIndex
instanceVariables.desc: 0 : is showing the first sentence, 1 : is showing the second, etc.

instanceVariables.name: IsDisplaying
instanceVariables.desc: True when it tries to display the text, false otherwise

instanceVariables.name: Etape
instanceVariables.desc: 0: ne fait rien, 1ou 2 ou 4 ou 5 : transitions, 3 : texte affich√© statiquement
